item.title: Bend, Oregon
item.description: For all our shared photos while in Oregon, see our Photo Gallery at /gallery/or If I had come here long before, I would have moved here… Our stay in Bend was brief– less than a week. Which is unfortunate. I should have stayed a month. Or maybe the rest of my life. Let me explain. I’ve spent the majority of my life living in Santa Cruz, California, which IMHO is unmatched by most locale’s on this planet.
